name: The Goo Game
description: Have you ever been stabbed and then your heart falls some radioactive goo in the sewer and then starts controlling the goo to get back to you? Yea, we’ve all been there. This very Goo Game tells the classic tale of a heart trying to get back to its body. Shoot goo to give a landing platform for your heart so it can get to the pipes and back to the body.
